<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2930</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Colors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Couleurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Colori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colores</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A list of links to activities and games to learn vocabulary related to colors</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Liste der Links zu den Aktivitäten und zu 
Spielen, zum des Wortschatzes zu erlernen in Verbindung gestanden auf 
Farben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une liste de liens aux activités et aux jeux pour
apprendre le vocabulaire lié aux couleurs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma lista das ligações às atividades e aos 
jogos para aprender o vocabulário relacionado às cores</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lista dei collegamenti alle attività ed ai 
giochi per imparare vocabolario relativo ai colori</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας κατάλογος συνδέσεων με τις δραστηριότητες και τα 
παιχνίδια για να μάθει το λεξιλόγιο σχετικό με τα χρώματα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una lista de conexiones a las actividades y a los 
juegos para aprender el vocabulario relacionado con los colores</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

            <value>final</value>

          <contribute>

version:3.0

        <educational>

        <classification>

          <taxonPath>
